trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class defines the recipient of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> definisce il destinatario di un messaggio CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: Constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> che rappresenta il certificato del destinatario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class by using the specified recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> costruisce un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> utilizzando il certificato del destinatario specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> classe ha i seguenti valori di proprietà predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: È stato passato un riferimento null a un metodo che non lo accetta come argomento valido.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Membro dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> che specifica il tipo dell'identificatore del destinatario.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> che rappresenta il certificato del destinatario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class by using the specified recipient identifier type and recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> costruisce un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> utilizzando il tipo di identificatore del destinatario e il certificato del destinatario specificati.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: È stato passato un riferimento null a un metodo che non lo accetta come argomento valido.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.Certificate" /> property retrieves the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.Certificate" /> recupera il certificato associato al destinatario.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that holds the certificate associated with the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> che contiene il certificato associato al destinatario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.RecipientIdentifierType" /> property retrieves the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.RecipientIdentifierType" /> recupera il tipo dell'identificatore del destinatario.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Membro dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> che specifica il tipo dell'identificatore del destinatario.
